channel.title: Father Ted on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Father Ted on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Father Ted’ Co-Creator Graham Linehan Arrested Over Trans X Posts
item.description: The Metropolitan Police confirmed the Sept. 1 arrest at Heathrow Airport of a “man in his 50s” on suspicion of incitement to violence.
